body_html: This is expected, the time it takes to launch the GPU threads and establishing shared memory is the bottleneck for computing the inverse of this small matrix. The GPU is much faster when the matrix is large enough.
body_text: This is expected, the time it takes to launch the GPU threads and establishing shared memory is the bottleneck for computing the inverse of this small matrix. The GPU is much faster when the matrix is large enough.
body: This is expected, the time it takes to launch the GPU threads and establishing shared memory is the bottleneck for computing the inverse of this small matrix. The GPU is much faster when the matrix is large enough.
